datasetId.title: Dataset Id
datasetId.description: Id of the dataset where the data are located. Image URLs will be extracted from there.

pathToImageUrls.title: Path to image URLs
pathToImageUrls.description: Path from item object to an array or string where the URL(s) is/are located. Provide in "javascript style", e.g. "details[0].images

fileNameFunction.title: Filename function
fileNameFunction.description: Function that specifies how will be image filename created from its URL. If you keep this empty, it will be md5 hash of the URL.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Max items to load from the dataset. Use with `offset` to paginate over the data (can reduce memory requirement of large loads).
limit.sectionDescription: More options for input data and where output data will be saved. Output data are transformed input data, not images. For them use upload options

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: How many items to skip from the dataset. Use with `limit` to paginate over the data (can reduce memory requirement of large loads)

outputTo.title: Output to
outputTo.description: Where to save the data from input after possibly transforming them during the download process.

storeInput.title: Key Value store input
storeInput.description: If you want to input the data from key-value store instead of dataset. Notation: `storeId-recordKey`, e.g. - `kWdGzuXuKfYkrntWw-OUTPUT`

uploadTo.title: Upload to
uploadTo.description: Where do you want to upload the image files
enumTitles: Zip file (Can't be used with output to dataset)

uploadStoreName.title: Key-value store name
uploadStoreName.description: Key-value store name where the images will be upload. Empty field means it will be uploaded to the default key-value store

s3Bucket.title: S3 Bucket
s3Bucket.description: Only relevant if you want to upload to S3! Name of the bucket where to upload.

s3AccessKeyId.title: S3 Access key id
s3AccessKeyId.description: Only relevant if you want to upload to S3! You can create these credentials for IAM user.

s3SecretAccessKey.title: S3 Secret access key
s3SecretAccessKey.description: Only relevant if you want to upload to S3! You can create these credentials for IAM user.

s3CheckIfAlreadyThere.title: Check if key is already on S3
s3CheckIfAlreadyThere.description: This option is useful if you don't want to rewrite the same image. GET requests are also cheaper than PUT requests

preDownloadFunction.title: Pre-download function
preDownloadFunction.description: Function that specifies how will be the data transformed before downloading the image. The input and output of the function is the whole data array. You can skip downloading images of any item if you add skipItem: true field to it.
preDownloadFunction.sectionDescription: You can use these functions to transform your data before and/or after the image download process.

postDownloadFunction.title: Post-download function
postDownloadFunction.description: Function that specifies how will be the data transformed before downloading the image. The input and output of the function is the whole data array. By default it adds either the file URL or errors array depending if the download was successfull.

imageCheckMaxRetries.title: Max retries
imageCheckMaxRetries.description: How many times should actor retry if the file it tries to download fails to pass the tests. Setting this too high can lead to unecessary loops.

imageCheckType.title: Image check type
imageCheckType.description: Type of the image check. If the image will not pass, the download will be retied with proxy and if that doesn't pass, the image is not uploaded.

imageCheckMinSize.title: Min size in KB
imageCheckMinSize.description: Minimum size of the image to pass the image check test

imageCheckMinWidth.title: Min width
imageCheckMinWidth.description: Minimim width of the image in pixels to pass the image check. Works only if the image check type is 'jimp'.

imageCheckMinHeight.title: Min height
imageCheckMinHeight.description: Minimim height of the image in pixels to pass the image check. Works only if the image check type is 'jimp'.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: You can specify how many maximum parallel downloading/uploading requests will be running. Keep in mind that the limit is here to not overload the host server.

downloadTimeout.title: Download timeout in ms
downloadTimeout.description: How long we will wait to download each image

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of items loaded from dataset in one batch.

convertWebpToPng.title: Convert webp to png
convertWebpToPng.description: If checked, the actor will automatically convert all webp type images to standard png. This increases the size of the image.

stateFields.title: State fields
stateFields.description: You can specify fields that you want in your state to make it more readable and use less memory. By default it uses all.

noDownloadRun.title: Run without download
noDownloadRun.description: If checked, the actor will not download and upload the images. Usefull for checking duplicates or transformations.
